item.title: HOMETOWN INTERNATIONAL, INC. 10-K
item.description: HOMETOWN INTERNATIONAL, INC., which is in the Retail-Convenience Stores [5412] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 26 2021 had 14460 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 317 instances 2020 - 238 instances note - 165 instances 31 - 161 instances 000 - 160 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
